Name: RequireNodeIdentity
Description: Node identity must exist before any subsystem can run.

Name: RequireSGIIntegrity
Description: SGI Integrity Engine must be online.

Name: RequireHeartbeatActive
Description: Heartbeat must be executing every cycle.

Name: RequirePolicyEngineActive
Description: Policy Engine must not be disabled.

Name: RequireTrustSeal
Description: TrustSeal must exist for SyncChain operations.

Name: RequireMeshOnline
Description: NodeMesh must have a mesh ID and discovery timestamp.
